headline: U.K. Fire and Rescue Services Deploy Motorola Solutions' Control Room Solution, Creating a New Fire & Rescue Services Hub
summary: U.K. fire and rescue services (FRSs) Hereford and Worcester FRS, Shropshire FRS, Cleveland Fire Brigade and Country Durham & Darlington FRS have selected Motorola Solutions (NYSE: MSI) to deploy a new Control Room Solution (CRS) utilising a shared control room platform to allow the four control rooms to work independently as well as a collaborative services hub. The new solution integrates workflows from initial call taking to dispatch, into an intuitive and unified response system. It will stan
